summary: This mod added a bank in Whiterun with the employees. It's possible to buy a trade (6 to take), a property, a title, borrow to money, repay to debts, and more surprises. Extensions are not obligatory, the last version is the 1.6. (SkyUI + SKSE) required.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/660267Header.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/635497TechnicalInformation.jpg[/img]
Bordeciel Bank Mod (series) -> Whiterun

[color=#a2c4c9]Version [/color][color=#ea9999]1.6.[/color]
[color=#dbb0a7]Advice :[/color] Start a new game.

This version added a MCM.
[i]My versions : SKSE 1.7.1 and SkyUI 3.0.[/i]

[color=#a2c4c9]In this version of mod :[/color]
-[color=#B45F06] [color=#b6d7a8]Added a MCM[/color][/color][color=#f9cb9c]([i]setting Menu[/i])[/color]
- [color=#b6d7a8]Upgrade of lights[/color]
- [color=#b6d7a8]Upgrade of script[/color]
- [color=#b6d7a8]Upgrade documents[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8][color=#ffffff]-[/color] Fix bug light exterior
[color=#ffffff]-[/color] Replace 'po' with 'gold'[/color]

[color=#a2c4c9]language [/color]: English
[color=#a2c4c9]Creator [/color]: Or@tchi

[color=#a2c4c9]obligatory files [/color]: Skyrim.esm
[color=#f4cccc]SKSE[/color] + [color=#f4cccc]SkyUI[/color] are required.

[color=#a2c4c9]Set up mod [/color]: add WhitBBM.esp and WhitBBM.bsa
[color=#f9cb9c](In your data directory)[/color]

[color=#a2c4c9]Remove mod [/color]: delete whitBBM.esp and WhitBBM.bsa
[color=#f9cb9c](In your data directory)[/color]

[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/931558Smalldescription.jpg[/img]
This mod added a bank in Whiterun with the employees.
It's possible to buy a trade (6 to take), a property,
a title, borrow to money, repay to debts, to change gold in ingot, and more surprises...
extensions are not obligatory, this version is the 1.0.

[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/762380Fulldescription.jpg[/img]
Official extensions are not require, just the master file "Skyrim.esm".

I have happy to develop this mod and I count on your help for make it grow.
Encourage, write a review, I am receptive.

More d√©tails ?

In this mod Whiterun is the target.
A bank is added with pnjs (Banker, Pawnbroker, Solicitor, Director and more...)

Setup possible with the MCM (Menu)
[color=#d0e0e3]It's possible to take a borrow.
It's possible to repay a loan.
It's possible to repay a debt (trade).
It's possible to purchase a trade (with income and expenses).
If you have a trade you have a salary (all the 24 hours in your safe).
It's possible to purchase a house.
It's possible to purchase a gracious title.
It's possible to purchase a safe at the bank.
It's possible to purchase a personal chest at the bank.
It's possible to exchanges (gold with Paper money).[/color]

And more...

[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/682655Compatibility.jpg[/img]
All official extensions (Dawnguard, Dragonborn, HearthFires)
And most mods.
author: Oratchi
